channel.title: R Markdown on Mike's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on Mike's Blog

item.title: Example Rmd
item.description: This is an example of the Rmd file for future reference…This is just a copy of Frida Gorman’s example. R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.
